installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y tar curl jq file bzip2 wget

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi
rm murmur.x86
cd /tmp

if  [[ "${MUMBLE_VERSION}" == "latest" ]] ; then
echo "Downloading latest 1.4 version"
wget https://dl.mumble.info/latest/stable/server-linux-x64 -O server-linux-x64
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mumble-voip/mumble/master/scripts/murmur.ini -O murmur.ini
mv server-linux-x64 murmur.x86
chmod +x murmur.x86
cp murmur.ini /mnt/server
cp murmur.x86 /mnt/server
else
echo "Downloading: ${MUMBLE_VERSION}"
wget  https://github.com/mumble-voip/mumble/releases/download/${MUMBLE_VERSION}/murmur-static_x86-${MUMBLE_VERSION}.tar.bz2 -O murmur-static_x86-${MUMBLE_VERSION}.tar.bz2
tar -xjvf murmur-static_x86-${MUMBLE_VERSION}.tar.bz2
cp -r murmur-static_x86-*/* /mnt\/server
fi
echo "done"
